text: The Eldeen Wolves are a guerilla group operating in western [[Aundair]] and the eastern [[Eldeen Reaches]]. The Eldeen Wolves have stepped up their kidnapping, sabotage, and murder operations along Aundair's western border during the past year, demanding that Aundair withdraw all forces from the [[Wynarn River]] valley. Led by a charismatic, mysterious figure known only as ''Rhunadask'', the group operates from bases deep within the wilderness of the [[Riverwood]] and [[Wolfwood]] and clashes frequently with the Aundairian army.
title: Eldeen Wolves
